statsAutres.cImmune: to blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, poisoned, prone, stunned.

features.description: You lie dormant until a creature moves within 10 ft. of you. You may then activate immediately and use Spore Cloud. You remain active for up to 1 hour.

features.name: Sporecloud
features.description: Save: DC 14 vs CON, reach 10 ft., one creature. Hit: 5 (2d4) poison damage.
